name: Gyrocopter
title: Aurel Vlaicu
lore: After finding a crashed flying machine, Aurel Vlaicu spent years rebuilding it. Now he soars above battlefields.

rocketBarrage.name: Rocket Barrage
rocketBarrage.description: Launches rockets at nearby enemies, dealing damage over time.

homingMissile.name: Homing Missile
homingMissile.description: Launches a missile that homes in on an enemy, stunning on impact.

flakCannon.name: Flak Cannon
flakCannon.description: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemies in a range for a limited number of attacks.

callDown.name: Call Down
callDown.description: Calls down two missiles that slow and damage enemies in the target area.
